channel.title: PI adding name to a command { ignorecase("Username") to a command

item.title: PI adding name to a command { ignorecase("Username") to a command
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("gfx") && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Username")) { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); c.gfx0(Integer.parseInt(args[1])); }

item.title: PI adding name to a command { ignorecase("Username") to a command
item.dc:creator: @shank_beast shank beast
item.description:
@shank_beast wrote:

I want to add Ignorecase(“username”) { or whatever it is to a command so only 1 certaain player can use this command.

I would want it to go into this

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“gfx”)) {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
c.gfx0(Integer.parseInt(args[1]));
}
